bftsmart.tom.server

Interface BatchExecutable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Executable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRecoverable, DurabilityCoordinator, DurableThroughputServer, MemoryThroughputServer, StrongBlockchainRecoverable, StrongThroughputServer, WeakBlockchainRecoverable, WeakThroughputServer, YCSBServer 

    public interface BatchExecutable
extends Executable
    Executables that implement this interface will receive a batch of requests and deliver them to the application in a deterministic way.
